episodes.title: Episode 5: Strange sightings on an Alpha Minecraft channel | RetroGamingNow
episodes.description: By far one of my most favorite RGN videos, hope you all enjoy! | Original Video: https://youtu.be/9HuNmYjYgms?si=NXHk0Fe0EXUn9yOK | Thank you for listening! If you have any recommendations please feel free to comment or message me on Discord :3

episodes.title: Episode 6: The Story of OldRoot: Minecraft's Strangest Mystery | RetroGamingNow
episodes.description: Another one of my favorite RGN videos! Hope you all enjoy and if you have any requests as to what you would like to see on here please feel free to either comment or message me via discord :3 | Original Video: https://youtu.be/hXYriWVKO3c?si=8SG7gWDoRJy5gHRl

episodes.title: Episode 7: You've never heard of these Minecraft versions. Why not? | RetroGamingNow
episodes.description: Haven't uploaded a new episode recently and apologies for that, took a little mental break:) But I'm back and tonight you all will be receiving a double feature with this episode being the first one! Thank you all for listening and hope you enjoy tonight's episodes! | Original Video: ⁠https://youtu.be/_d5hEiYIKKU?si=u65Ifd_sQgFPD7bo

episodes.title: Episode 8: You've STILL never heard of these Minecraft versions. (AlphaVer Part 2) | RetroGamingNow
episodes.description: Part 2 to tonight's double feature! Couldn't just leave you all with that one episode and not include this one! Also, working on a website right now for the podcast! Will be up soon! | Original Video: ⁠https://youtu.be/HYPf4ukXYlw?si=sEQmn9hYl9tzrccp
